ModMetaData.name: Chiss
ModMetaData.author: TGrimm92
ModMetaData.description:
Chiss are tall blue-skinned near-human civilization. Chiss lived on Csilla in a Unknown Regions.
ComfyTemperature (-40,24)
Release adds the following features Chiss Pawns Starting Scenario Chiss Faction
Add Ons -Weapons -OutFits -Armor -Headgear
Dependencies his mod depends on the alien race framework by Erdelf. You can view its original post here https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=839005762, but at the time of the writing of this post the release is on beta 18 while 1.0 is required. You can obtain 1.0 on their github https://github.com/erdelf/AlienRaces/releases. Until Erdelf updates versioning the 1.0 does work just ignore the fact that it is red in the mod list.
Source https://github.com/tgrimabc?tab=repositories
Discord https://discord.gg/ZBFxJHe
Patreon https://www.patreon.com/user?u=13220445
